sizing.title: I18n Sizing Analyzer
sizing.language_stats_header: [TRANSLATE] Language		Keys		Total Chars		Avg Length		Max Length		Empty Keys
sizing.help_message:
[TRANSLATE] I18n Sizing Analyzer

Usage: node 06-analyze-sizing.js [options]

options:
  --source-dir <dir>     Source directory containing translation Fichiers (default: ./locales)
  --languages <langs>    Comma-separated list of languages to analyze (default: all)
  --output-Rapport        GÃ©nÃ©rer detailed sizing Rapport
  --format <format>      Output format: json, csv, table (default: table)
  --threshold <number>   Size difference threshold for Avertissements (default: 20%)
  --help                 Afficher this help message

Examples:
  node 06-analyze-sizing.js --output-Rapport
  node 06-analyze-sizing.js --languages=en,de,fr --format=json
  node 06-analyze-sizing.js --threshold=30 --output-Rapport

checkUsage.help_message:
[TRANSLATE] 
I18n Usage Analyzer

Usage: node i18ntk-usage.js [options]

options:
  --source-dir <dir>     Source directory to scan (default: ./src)
  --i18n-dir <dir>       I18n directory (default: ./src/locales)
  --output-Rapport        GÃ©nÃ©rer detailed Rapport
  --output-dir <dir>     Output directory for Rapports (default: ./Rapports)
  --help                 Afficher this help

Examples:
  node i18ntk-usage.js --output-Rapport
  node i18ntk-usage.js --source-dir=./app --i18n-dir=./locales
  node i18ntk-usage.js --output-dir=./Analyse --output-Rapport
